title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1627-4.5 - Leasing interview
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1627-4.5 - Leasing interview

State Regulations

At time of lease signing, tenant should be informed
of his rights and obligations under the lease. Prompt payment of rent should be
stressed. Tenant should be advised of the rules and regulations of tenancy, with special emphasis on the more important ones. Information should be
available on activities conducted in project, location of schools and churches, necessity for notifying post office as to address change, and any other matters
which might be helpful in his adjustment to his new home. Finally, he should be
urged to ask any questions he might have. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1627-4.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
